Exhibition history: Exhibited: 1983 Aug-Oct, Stratford, Passmore Edwards Museum, Life & Death in Ancient Egypt 1986 Jun-Oct, Carmarthen Museum, A son of Luxor's Sands 1989 1 Nov-1990 31 Dec, Malaysia, Kuala Lumpar, National Museum of Malaysia, Treasures from the Graves 1994 Jan-Mar, Doncaster Museum & Art Gallery, Ancient Egypt
